description: Strongly condemning the terror attack in Pathankot today, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said that enemies of humanity who cannot see the nation succeed, had attempted to cause harm to the Indian Armed Forces. He appreciated the Armed Forces for successfully defeating the designs of the terrorists…
caption: narendramodi.in
message: Saints, Seers, Rishis & Mutts have always enriched our society & contribute immensely to nation building. http://nm-4.com/4kfc
